about_the_game:
Introduce your opponents to the virtues of liberty, equality, and fraternity with three different French Navy ships, each representing a unique gameplay style. On top of that, a full day of Warships Premium Account will start you off on the right foot. Battleship Turenne, cruiser Friant, and destroyer Fusilier each come with their own 3-skill-point Commander and Port slot.

This bundle includes:

  • Tier III researchable* Destroyer Fusilier
  • Tier III researchable* Cruiser Friant
  • Tier III researchable* Battleship Turenne
  • 3x 3-skill-point French Commanders
  • 3x Port slots
  • 1 day of Warships Premium Account

If you already own one or more of these ships, you will not receive any compensation for them.

*These ships are researchable — meaning that they can be earned in-game through playing. This bundle offers to speed up your low Tier research by giving you immediate access to this nation's different ship types.

Please note: The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be credited to your Wargaming Account only once.
detailed_description:
Introduce your opponents to the virtues of liberty, equality, and fraternity with three different French Navy ships, each representing a unique gameplay style. On top of that, a full day of Warships Premium Account will start you off on the right foot. Battleship Turenne, cruiser Friant, and destroyer Fusilier each come with their own 3-skill-point Commander and Port slot.

This bundle includes:

  • Tier III researchable* Destroyer Fusilier

  • Tier III researchable* Battleship Turenne
  • 3x 3-skill-point French Commanders

If you already own one or more of these ships, you will not receive any compensation for them.

*These ships are researchable — meaning that they can be earned in-game through playing. This bundle offers to speed up your low Tier research by giving you immediate access to this nation's different ship types.

Please note: The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be credited to your Wargaming Account only once.
